title: Your mains' Passives are now three times as powerful. How OP are they?

replies.body:
{{champion:16}} 
"Soraka gains ~~70%~~ **210%** bonus movement speed when moving towards allied champions below 40% of their maximum health."

http://31.media.tumblr.com/84ef137ed521dee2d0245d9d8f8a94de/tumblr_nemy92wrku1sbaqxto1_1280.gif

Step aside bitches.
Would the 3 times apply to both parts? 210% move speed towards allies below 120% health?
105% crit chance at full fury tryndamere.
oh god no

I would finally be able to use those 45.5% crit damage runes effectively!
And essence reaver would give me 30% cdr right off the bat. Extra spin, more ult.... finally tryndamere would be balanced.

{{champion:131}} 750 + 240% AP with 60% bonus AS

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/544/108/8e3.jpg
(And every attack? :D)
{{champion:102}} they became an actual passive.

{{champion:4}} 

https://pics.onsizzle.com/s-traf-id-like-to-make-a-withdrawal-3057785.png

{{champion:122}} hahahahah

{{champion:420}} do they spawn 3x as often or hit 3x as hard? both are good 

{{champion:113}} big oink

{{champion:38}} 45% less magic damage. Goes back to 90% ban rate.

{{champion:45}} 3 AP just for hitting champions, 9 for kills/assists. Becomes full build after buying {{item:3089}} .

{{champion:106}} Restores 90% of his max HP every 2 minutes. Becomes Mundo 2.0.

{{champion:11}} Every 3rd auto attack is actually 6 auto attacks. lol............
No no, you did the Yi math wrong, it's every auto is actually 6, you multiplied part of it, not the whole thing.

no, you only multiply part of it, so its eithers every 4th auto is an extra 3 autos, or every, umm, the first way works better, so every 4th auto is an extra 3 autos, cuz if you multiply the whole thing its 9 times stronger, not 3 times
Every Auto is a double strike :P

Depends...
{{champion:28}} does camouflage X 3 = Stealth?

Not my mains, but

{{champion:157}} 3x the shield and 6x crit chance...
{{champion:202}} It's strong, I'm not gonna do the math, it's strong
{{champion:86}} What's a harass?
{{champion:36}} What's a harass?
{{champion:223}} Instant passive proc with 3x the duration
jhin would get really fast from att speed xD

Tripled passives?

Ahah
AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH

u do no damage

So as Anivia at lower levels you get -120 armor haha :D

{{champion:101}} - Restores 90 to 585 Mana on auto attacks (once per 12 seconds). Against champions that's doubled to 180 to 1,170 Mana

As cool as that sounds, it might actually be a nerf, since the passive only kicks in if you're missing that much mana.
Manamune Xerath though

{{champion:44}} 

Next 2 basic attacks after casting an ability gain 300% increased attack speed and deal 66-270 +45% bonus armor magic damage and reduce the cooldown of W and E by 3 seconds and Q by 18 seconds.

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/251/834/839.gif

Do some maths:

Level 2 has ~37 bonus armor and 0.6375 attack speed

Passive does 89 damage with 2.5 attack speed.  With w,e,w,e,w,e endlessly, passive dps + base ad of 60 would be 373.  Add in the fact that stun would be up about every 2 seconds and stuns for 1 second and he shields for 54 every 2 seconds, we have an absolute monster.
{{champion:14}} passive becomes not useless.
Or its just three times as useless

{{champion:245}} Does the bonus damage and speed pop after 1 hit? Or does it do triple the damage after 3 hits (240% Bonus movement speed)?
{{champion:107}} Bigger jumps?
{{champion:161}} Even more stupidly large amounts of true damage
{{champion:45}} How much AP? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SiMHTK15Pik

"What's his power level, Vegeta?"

"1006"

"Ha! I can handle that-"

"No, wait, I had the scanner upside down."

{{champion:99}} Stun + auto and you're dead.
{{champion:202}} His passive is complicated... maybe 3x the damage on each 4th auto? NO, IT MUST BE 4X!!!!
{{champion:163}} Stand next to a wall for a few seconds, and you can be on the other side of the map faster than Rek Sai!
Why does everyone call it a stun on Lux?  It's a root/snare.
{{champion:22}} When she crits you have negative move speed lol

Udyr is laughing in Master Yi ult at level 2

(+10% attack speed and 5 movespeed per stack, stacking up to 3 times) 

Means +90% Attack speed and 45 movespeed at level 2... Like a wet dream coupled with Tiger Stance's 30% and my runepage's 33%...)

Or wait, that means it also stacks up to 9 times. So provided i have the mana, that's a potential +270% AS and 135 movespeed... *Insert running in the 90s here*

{{champion:16}} Gets 210% MS when moving towards allies at less than 120% max health, has 7500 range. WEE WOO WEE WOO WEE WOO

{{champion:75}} Can hit 95% lifesteal and gets 9 stacks per Q, can't touch this.

{{champion:412}} 600% AD scaling AA in magic damage + souls every 3.3 seconds. Thresh ADC is back

{{champion:136}} 9 stars...Gap close past them or get booped to death.
{{champion:34}} I would have figured three seperate eggs instead of more durability in egg mode but hrm, an interesting thought.
{{champion:28}} ....Hrrm. Only thing I can think of is the way her mana regen increases while in stealth, so more mana faster, and maybe 3x less time before vanishing, which well, have fun catching me if I think a fight's about to go wrong.
Kindred: becomes balanced
{{champion:75}} 60% Wifesteal OP

{{champion:136}} 

Aurelion Sol is constantly orbited by ~~six~~ **nine** Stars, and beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his damaging abilities. Ability-inhibiting crowd control disables Center of the Universe.
The Stars deal **60 - 390** (based on level) (+ **15 / 30 / 45 / 60 / 75**) (+ **54 - 105** (based on level)% AP) magic damage and apply spell effects to enemies that come in contact with them, executing minions below **75** health.

(Not to mention that his W increases their damage by 50%)

BUM! Level 1 Pentakills.
{{champion:429}}  Who needs boots when you just jump across the entire lane with one AA

That thresh would also have a lot more AP xD

{{champion:267}}  180+ move speed per ability that hits an ally. Heeeerrreee hecy hecy hecy ;)

Who needs boots? xD
{{champion:202}} 3 out of 4 of jhins shots guarantee crit, talk about early game dominance
